title: You know what I'm looking forward to the most about York's VGU?
body:
His interactions with the other Shadow Isles champs.
Especially Mordekaiser.

replies.body: You could say he'll be **New York**
that was gucking freat

YOU WILL REMEMBER YORICK MORI.

But in all seriousness, it does not say that Mordekaiser is friends with Yorick, which totally blows.
While Yorick is definitely not friends with Mordekaiser it doesn't mean he can't have any cool interactions with him :P

How can one NOT be friends with Mordekaiser?
He's the paragon of happiness and he's a shining beacon of friendliness, a true champion for the just!
As someone playing both Garen and Mordekaiser, I feel very conflicted about your comment...

"I can play a mean guitar, too."
*Starts playing on his shovel*
"Well, better than you at least."
But does his rig f*cking melt eleven?
Melts 12
11? Pshh. Yorick's gone so high he's brought a new meaning to "Death Metal."

I'm guessing he's not friends with everyone from the Shadow Isles, except maybe {{champion:429}} {{champion:57}} and  {{champion:28}}

{{champion:30}}: Yorick would be disgusted with his worship of Death.
{{champion:82}}: Loathes him entirely for killing and raising more undead.
{{champion:56}}: Not a fan of murdering people in their sleep.
{{champion:412}}: Possibly know him in life before Yorick died, but probably hates him for his sadistic nature.
{{champion:120}}: Hates him for enjoying killing innocents.
{{champion:60}}: Doesn't like the idea of luring people to the "Spider God."
___
{{champion:28}}: Possibly found Evelynn corrupted by Shadow Isles and kinda saved her from becoming an actual undead.
{{champion:429}}: Maybe the only one that knows of her existence and understands why Hecarim shouldn't be trusted.
{{champion:57}}: Probably knows Maokai in life before Yorick died, and understands why Maokai detests the undead.

Yorick would probably be the only undead that doesn't like to be undead and doesn't find Death being a great thing.
But the VGU will revamp his backstory too, so this could be made into a thing.
Yorick is kinda his own thing... not quite tied up with the main shadow isle story
Yeah I can't wait for Yorick. They've been teasing that new champ for ages. We've never had a ghoulmancer before.
we have you
Of course it's for Mordekaiser. Isn't it always?

When you read the post before you read the OP's name...
Needless to say I checked it as soon as I read the thread. :^)
hue hue hue

Im looking forward to his rework. It looks like he will be spawning a lot of his ghouls. I think a ghoul wall would be a neat ability, and the ghouls aa's would slow like how zyras plants work. I imagine he a suporty top lane, kind of like maokai, and he will offer a lot of zone control. At least thats what the teaser screenshots have me set to believe. Id link the source but I have absolutely no idea where it went. I think it might have been an older Riot post or something.
I can't wait for Yorick to be an actual champion again, he's so outdated that facing him feels like dusting off an entire store of cabinets that also get dust inside them.
